extension.description: Restores the build package; the first-run service applies GUI preferences on next start.
extension.news: [1.0.2] Safer defaults (Fresh/OFF, Remove GUI/OFF, Auto-skin/OFF, Restart/OFF) + Guard against restart if skin prompt is active; log when auto-skin is disabled. [1.0.1] Wait for "Keep skin?" prompt before any restart to avoid freeze.
